All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Enemy
Snake extending class.
FoodGenerator
The purpose of this class is to generate food on the map.
Frog
This class describes frog and its behavior.
Fruit
Class describing a fruit
Game
Class describing a game It contains all the essential parts of the game like for example a game loop
GameObject
An abstract class that describes Game Object Direction variable describes in which direction the object will go in the next tick: 0=none; 1=down; 2=left; 3=up; 4=right;
GameState
 
Handler
The class meant to handle all the objects in the game
ID
 
KeyInput
This class handles all the keyboard inputs
MouseInput
This class handles all the mouse inputs
Snake
This class describes the Snake object.
Tile
Class describing Tile, the part of snakes body
Window
Class describing window
